data.name: Central Processing Unit (CPU)
data.description: The air hums. Corridors branch off. A sturdy-looking door to the east is currently closed. A faint inscription reads 'Sector 0,0,0'.

interactables.name: a sturdy metal lever
interactables.description: A heavy metal lever is set into the wall, currently in the 'up' position.

on_interact_effect.message_success_self: You pull the lever down with a CLUNK. You hear a mechanism engage nearby.
on_interact_effect.message_success_others: {character_name} pulls the lever. A distant clunk is heard.

data.name: North Data Conduit Alpha
data.description: A sterile corridor stretches northwards. Panel N-1. The walls are smooth and featureless for the most part.

interactables.name: a slightly loose wall panel
interactables.description: Upon closer inspection, one of the wall panels seems slightly askew. You could probably pry it open.

on_interact_effect.message_success_self: You pry the loose panel open. Tucked inside, you find a datachip labeled 'Emergency Exit Override Codes - Obsolete'. It crumbles to dust as you touch it.
on_interact_effect.message_success_others: {character_name} pries open a loose wall panel, finding something that quickly turns to dust.

data.name: Secure Storage Vault Epsilon
data.description: Dust motes dance in the dim light. Shelves line the walls, mostly empty. Panel E-1.

data.name: South Maintenance Tunnel 7
data.description: Dimly lit and smelling faintly of burnt coffee. A heavy iron door blocks the way south. Panel S-1.

data.name: Deep Archive Sector 42
data.description: Ancient, whirring machinery fills this chamber. It feels important. Panel S-2.

data.name: West Logic Gate Array
data.description: To the west, a series of humming conduits. Panel W-1.

data.name: Nexus Junction N-2
data.description: A wider intersection of data conduits.

data.name: Quiet Reflection Alcove
data.description: A surprisingly calm alcove. Soft light emanates from the walls. You feel a sense of peace here.

data.name: Automated Goods Dispenser Node
data.description: A humming terminal offers various wares for digital currency. A holographic shopkeeper glitches occasionally.

data.name: Combat Simulation Pod
data.description: A sleek pod invites users to hone their skills. A sign reads: 'Skill Enhancement Services'.
